description: Adds +4 flat Crit to your total each round.

name: +20 Damage

description: Adds +40 flat Damage to your total each round.

name: +1 Crit per Upgraded Unit
description: Gain +1 Crit for each unit in your Army that has been upgraded.

name: +1 Crit per Skipped Level
description: Gain +1 Crit for each level you skipped this run.

name: +2 Damage per Gold
description: Gain +2 Damage for each Gold you currently have.

name: +1 Crit per Potion Used
description: Gain +1 Crit for each potion you’ve used this run.

name: +1 Army Size
description: Increase your Army size by 1 slot.

name: +1 Attack per Level
description: Gain +1 extra attack each new Level.

name: Rank Up Random Unit
description: Ranks up 1 random unit in your Army at the start of each Level.

name: Copy Right Artifact
description: Copies the ability of the artifact to its right.

name: Retrigger Attacking Units
description: All attacking units are retriggered after their first attack.

name: +5 Gold on Level Loss
description: Gain +5 Gold whenever you lose a Level.

name: Heal 10% HP After Level
description: Heal the Hero for 10% of max HP after each Level.

name: +20% Max HP
description: Increases the Hero's maximum HP by 20%.
